title: Try Out a Belt Bag With This (on Sale) North Face Number
text:
1 item in this article Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

While a belt bag strewn across one’s shoulders has been a “look” among young people for a while, it seems to be reaching a fever pitch; more and more folks are leaving their Fjallravens at home in favor of fashion fanny packs. For those who’d like to dip their toe into the world of bum bags (yet another term for them), might we suggest this option from the North Face. It comes in an array of pleasing color combinations, the strap adjusts so you can wear it around your waist or across your body, and there’s a main compartment for easy access as well as an “an invisible secure-zip outer pocket that hides the important stuff.” Most notably, it’s on sale for 17 percent off at Urban Outfitters.
